A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If your reading this review and want to see the movie\, don’t. I would have rated this movie zero stars\, but you can’t do that.... I’m so disappointed with what they turned this life changing franchise into. They broke every rule that Star Wars has ever had\, if Yoda can’t fly through space then neither can Princess Leia. They made Luke look like a jerk and I hated how they made him look so dark when they showed the flashback of him almost killing Kylo. The jokes were corny and unoriginal. Also\, I don’t know what the heck they were doing with Luke’s hologram thing but it was stupid. I am truly disappointed....they broke my dads heart
